content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation; electrical id: 2224).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network identified as ElectricityGroup with id=2224 (voltage=0).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_systems: [6644]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_systems: [6644]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5)).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6644 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6645 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6646 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6651 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6650 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6655 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6654 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6657 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- Electricity Network: ElectricityGroup with id=2224 connecting poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System References for Steam Engine Water Supply:
  - Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [6300, 6343, 6386, 6429, 6472, 6515, 6558, 6601] have failed. Update the connection reference to the active PipeGroup fluid_system (currently 6644) to supply water.

• Pipeline Network Alignment and Stabilization:
  - Ensure that all pipe connection points and intermediate segments are precisely aligned and free from obstructions. Allow sufficient stabilization time after connection attempts.

• Steam Engine and Power Network Configuration:
  - Verify that the steam engine is connected to both the working pipeline (fluid_system=6644) and the updated power network (ElectricityGroup with id=2224).
